chat.msg: Welcome!
Which animal is near the start?
To the left of the starting point, there is a small island. On this island, you will find a leopard resting. The correct path passes just below the leopard. Can you see the island and the leopard?
Yes
Great! You are currently at the top-right corner of the map. Can you please describe what you see around you?
A parrot, butterfly and frog and water
Good job! Now, I want you to take a few steps to your left. What do you see now?
An island with a parrot and elephant

Fantastic! You are on the right track. To continue the path, I want you to go over the head of the parrot and then head down (south) between the parrot and the elephant. Can you please follow these instructions and let me know when you've done it?
Done

Great job! Now, I want you to leave that island and head in a south-eastern direction. You will pass over 3 rocks, 2 gray ones and a darker one. After that, you will reach a new island with a frog on it. Can you please make your way there and let me know when you've arrived?
Done

Wonderful! Now, from the frog's island, I want you to go below (south of) the frog and then do a u-turn to the left (west). Take your time to follow this path and let me know when you've completed the maneuver.
Done

Fantastic! Now, I want you to make your way back to the island with the parrot and elephant. This time, you will be crossing over the back of a crocodile. Go ahead, and let me know when you've safely crossed over the crocodile.
DOne

Great job! You're almost there. From the island with the parrot and elephant, I want you to cross over two gray rocks towards an island with a giraffe. The giraffe is located on the left side of the map. Take your time to reach the giraffe and let me know once you're there.
Done

Excellent! We're getting close to the treasure now. From the giraffe's island, I want you to go below (south-west) the giraffe, then make a 90-degree turn to the left (south-east), and cross over to another island with a snake on it. Can you please follow these instructions and let me know when you've reached the island with the snake?
Here

Perfect! We've made it to the last step. From the island with the snake, I need you to go over the snake and continue on the path ahead. Keep going, and soon you will reach the final objective: the treasure! Take your time and let me know when you've reached the treasure.

chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello
Where do I go to start?
Hello! Welcome to our map navigation game. Are you ready to begin?
Great! To start, please take a few steps towards the left (west) from where you are. Can you see anything interesting around you?
A bench and trail
Fantastic! You're on the right track. Now, please follow the trail and continue to move west, passing below the wooden bench. What do you see ahead of you?
A flower shop

Almost there! Instead of going to the flower shop, please make a U-turn to your left and cross the stream again, heading back towards where you started. Let me know when you've reached the white dog sitting nearby.
Done
Great job! Now, just next to the white dog, there should be a wooden branch crossing a river. Please cross over the branch, heading to the south. Let me know when you've reached the other side.
Done

Fantastic progress! From there, continue heading southwards (down the map). You should come across another white dog sitting next to a red and white checkered picnic. Can you describe what you see around you?
A dog and a picnic table
Excellent! Now, go over the picnic mat, being careful not to disturb the bowl of berries on it, and continue moving towards the west. What do you see on your way?
2 logs

Great observation! Keep going until you reach another wooden branch, which crosses the river again, this time heading north. Cross over the branch and let me know when you've safely reached the other side.
Done

Good job! Now, after crossing the river, you'll notice a green bush. Rather than touching the bush, circle around it from the right side, and continue going northward. Let me know when you've completed this step.
Done
Fantastic! You're doing great. Now, please continue moving west until you reach the florist stand. Take your time to look around and let me know what you see there.
A couple on a bike
Very observant! Now, please turn left (west) and go below the florist stand. You should now see a big bridge with two elderly people sitting on a bench, reading newspapers. Can you see them?
Yeah
Great! Now, continue moving south for a few steps, passing between the elderly people and another wooden branch. What do you see to your south?
A sitting deer
Almost there! Instead of going towards the sitting deer, please turn east and walk between the wooden branch and the green bush. Take your time, and let me know when you've completed this step.

chat.msg: Welcome!
Where do I go?
Start by taking a few steps south from the tent. Describe what you see.
A dog
Great! You've reached a puppy. Now, turn left (east) and continue a few steps. Can you describe what you see next?
Rocks and bushes
Good job! You're on the right track. Now, leave the trail and pass the small bonfire on your left (north). Keep heading east on the trail. Let me know when you see something else.
A red grill

Almost there! Keep going east on the trail. Pass under two red mushrooms and you'll see a blue car. Remember, don't touch the car. Instead, make a right U-turn and head back west to where the road forks. Let me know when you get there.
Done
Fantastic! Now, at the fork, take the left (south) branch. As you continue south, you'll pass east of a telescope. Describe what you see on your way.
Bushes

Great! Keep going until you reach the telescope. Once you're there, veer right and take an off-trail shortcut around the telescope. Make sure you're back on the trail. Let me know once you're back on the trail.
Done

Perfect! Now, continue west on the trail. Eventually, you'll come across a low wall of rocks that surround a wooden cabin. Cross the wall and reach the cabin. You've reached your final objective! Well done!
Here

Awesome! You've made it to the wooden cabin, congratulations! You successfully followed the path. Great navigation skills! 

Is there anything else you'd like to explore or any other adventures you'd like to embark on?
no
Alright then! If you ever feel like exploring or embarking on another adventure, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
